attributes.action: Make it law that discrimination and racist crimes against white peoples carry the same weight as any other race
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The term is 'positive racism' - there is no such thing as positive racism against any race.

Currently the police state that racist crimes against white people by other races are not such as there is no such thing as racism against whites. It should be law that racist crimes are equal for ALL races and colours including white and british people
